import React, { useState } from "react"; import { APP_NAME } from "../config"; import Link from "next/link"; import { signout, isAuth } from "../actions/auth"; import Nprogress from "nprogress"; import { Collapse, Navbar, NavbarToggler, NavbarBrand, Nav, NavItem, NavLink, UncontrolledDropdown, DropdownToggle, DropdownMenu, DropdownItem, NavbarText } from "reactstrap"; import Router from "next/router"; import Search from "../components/blog/Search"; Router.onRouteChangeStart = url => Nprogress.start(); Router.onRouteChangeComplete = url => Nprogress.done(); Router.onRouteChangeError = url => Nprogress.done(); const Header = props => { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); const toggle = () => setIsOpen(!isOpen); return ( Travel Blog
Blogs Categories Asia Europe India North America South America Middle East Oceania Africa {!isAuth() && ( Signin )} {!isAuth() && ( Signup )} {isAuth() && isAuth().role !== 1 && ( {`${isAuth().name}'s Dashboard`} )} {isAuth() && isAuth().role === 1 && ( {`${isAuth().name}'s Dashboard`} )} {isAuth() && ( signout(() => Router.replace(`/signin`))} > Signout )} {isAuth() && ( Write A Blog )} {!isAuth() && ( Write A Blog )}
{/* */} ); }; export default Header;
